name: Chili
recipeIngredient: Peppers (any that you desire, not necessary) diced into small pieces
4 (14.5 oz) cans of Diced tomatoes (chili flavored)
2 -3 cans ofs Beans (kidney preferred, light/dark, shake before opening and do not drain/rinse)
4 -10 drops ofs Dave's Insanity Sauce (any more and it gets really hot)

recipeInstructions.text: Get a big pot that is capable of holding all of the ingredients.
Fry the bacon in the pot and remove when done. Cut up the bacon and save for later.
Saute the onion. Add the can of chipotle peppers in the bacon fat.
Add the Worcestershire sauce and any other peppers that you decided to use.
Add the beef and sausage and brown it.
Add the canned tomatoes, spices, beans, and cut up bacon. Stir until mixed, then add drops of insanity sauce.
Simmer on low heat for 3-4+ hours or until satisfied with consistency.
